data.title: 26 Best Book Publishing Companies in New York
data.meta_description: Explore the best book publishing companies in New York. Discover top-rated publishers shaping the literary landscape with quality services and expertise.
data.text:
1

Writers Of USA

Writers Of USA is an innovative book publishing services that specialize in various different genres. Their services are not only limited to book publishing but they also cover book design, book editing, audio books and eBooks. Their book authors are perfect wordsmith that keep the clients involved and execute everything as per client’s wishes. They cater to clients of all age groups and diverse walks of life. They stay dedicated and work around the clock to make sure that the clients manuscript reaches perfection. Once Published they make sure that the message reaches the right audience. Their Goal is to spread positivity and knowledge through their publications and as a result they have achieved a positive response and admiration from the audience.

Phone: 833-256-7171

Location: United States

Hours: 9 am–5 pm

2

TimesGhostwriters

TimesGhostwriters is an affordable book publisher in the USA. They offer comprehensive book publication services, including Amazon Kindle, iBook, Google Books, Audible, Lulu Publishing, Kobo Book Publishing, and Ingramspark Publishing. Additionally, they provide book design, marketing, editing, and the creation of audiobooks and eBooks. The talented team at TimesGhostwriters excels in crafting compelling narratives, actively involving clients throughout the process to ensure every detail aligns with their vision. Serving clients of all ages and backgrounds, they dedicate their efforts around the clock to perfect each manuscript. Once published, they ensure the message reaches the intended audience. Their mission is to inspire and educate through their work, earning widespread appreciation and positive feedback from readers.

Address: 95 Third Street 2nd Floor San Francisco California 94103 USA

Phone: +1 (855) 587-7621

Location: US

Hours: 24 Hours
